text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/task-status-reason defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
missing MissingAn item nessary for task completion is missing.
misidentified MisidentifiedSomething related to the task was misidentified.
equipment-issue Equipment-issueA piece of equipment necessary for completion of the task is malfunctioning.
environmental-issue Environmental-issueSomething in the environment is preventing task completion.
personnel-issue Personnel-issueKey personnel necessary for task completion are not present.

name: TaskStatusReason
title: Task Status Reason
description: The current status reason of the task.

concept.definition: An item nessary for task completion is missing.
Something related to the task was misidentified.
A piece of equipment necessary for completion of the task is malfunctioning.
Something in the environment is preventing task completion.
Key personnel necessary for task completion are not present.
